properties.sql:
SELECT sp.Id as id, FROM_UNIXTIME(floor(sact.activated/1000)) as dateCreated, sass.resourceid as resourceId, sact.Name AS Atividade, sp.Name AS Processo, dp.c_urgencia AS Urgencia, dp.c_origem_processo as OrigemProcesso, dp.c_nome_banco AS NomeBanco, dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NumeroWFBanco, dp.c_n_wf_pl as NumeroWFPL, dp.c_tipo_processo as TipoProcesso, dp.c_nome_cliente as NomeCliente, c_estado_contratacao AS EstadoContratacao, sact.Id AS ActivityId, from_unixtime(sact.LimitTime/1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as limittime, sla.c_data_inicio as DataInicio,sla.c_data_fim as DataFim, ip.c_nome AS Cliente, ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento, sla.c_duracao as SLADuracao, interp.c_intervencao_juridica, interp.c_intervencao_juridica_novo, p.c_servico as Servico, null as DateModified
FROM shkprocesses sp
JOIN app_fd_info_diligencia d on sp.Id = d.id
LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
LEFT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
LEFT JOIN app_fd_processos p ON p.id = d.c_id_processo
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
LEFT JOIN app_fd_interv_processo interp ON interp.c_id_processo = p.id
LEFT JOIN app_fd_sla_atividade sla ON sla.c_id_processo LIKE (SELECT sp2.Id
																FROM shkprocesses sp2
                                                                WHERE sp2.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id ORDER BY Created DESC LIMIT 1)
LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
    AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                        WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                        AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
WHERE sps.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running'
AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')
AND (sla.c_estado_atividade is null or sla.c_estado_atividade = 'Em curso' or sla.c_estado_atividade = 'Pendente')
AND sass.resourceid LIKE '%#currentUser.username#%'
UNION
SELECT sp.Id as id, FROM_UNIXTIME(floor(sact.activated/1000)) as dateCreated, sass.resourceid as resourceId, sact.Name AS Atividade, sp.Name AS Processo, dp.c_urgencia AS Urgencia, dp.c_origem_processo as OrigemProcesso, dp.c_nome_banco AS NomeBanco, dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NumeroWFBanco, dp.c_n_wf_pl as NumeroWFPL, dp.c_tipo_processo as TipoProcesso, dp.c_nome_cliente as NomeCliente, c_estado_contratacao AS EstadoContratacao, sact.Id AS ActivityId, from_unixtime(sact.LimitTime/1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as limittime, sla.c_data_inicio as DataInicio,sla.c_data_fim as DataFim, ip.c_nome AS Cliente, ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento, sla.c_duracao as SLADuracao, interp.c_intervencao_juridica, interp.c_intervencao_juridica_novo, p.c_servico as Servico, dp.dateModified as DateModified
FROM shkprocesses sp
JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
LEFT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
LEFT JOIN app_fd_interv_processo interp ON interp.c_id_processo = p.id
LEFT JOIN app_fd_sla_atividade sla ON sla.c_id_processo = sp.Id
LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
    AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                        WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                        AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
WHERE sps.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running'
AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')
AND (c_estado_contratacao is null or (c_estado_contratacao <> 'PND' AND c_estado_contratacao <> 'PNDEQ'))
AND (sla.c_estado_atividade is null or sla.c_estado_atividade = 'Em curso' or sla.c_estado_atividade = 'Pendente')
AND sass.resourceid LIKE '%#currentUser.username#%'
UNION
(SELECT sp.Id as id, FROM_UNIXTIME(floor(sact.activated/1000)) as dateCreated, sass.resourceid as resourceId, sact.Name AS Atividade, sp.Name AS Processo, null AS Urgencia, null as OrigemProcesso, null AS NomeBanco, dp.c_n_processo AS NumeroWFBanco, null as NumeroWFPL, dp.c_tipo_processo as TipoProcesso, null as NomeCliente, dp.c_estado AS EstadoContratacao, sact.Id AS ActivityId, from_unixtime(sact.LimitTime/1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as limittime, sla.c_data_inicio as DataInicio, sla.c_data_fim as DataFim, null AS Cliente, null AS DataAgendamento, sla.c_duracao as SLADuracao, null, null, p.c_servico as Servico, null as DateModified
FROM shkprocesses sp
JOIN app_fd_processos_procu p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_proce_procu dp ON p.c_detalhe_processo = dp.id
LEFT JOIN app_fd_sla_atividade sla ON sla.c_id_processo LIKE (SELECT sp2.Id
																FROM shkprocesses sp2
                                                                WHERE sp2.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id ORDER BY Created DESC LIMIT 1)
LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
LEFT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
WHERE sass.resourceid LIKE '%#currentUser.username#%'
ORDER BY Urgencia DESC, DataFim)
UNION
(SELECT sp.Id as id, FROM_UNIXTIME(floor(sact.activated/1000)) as dateCreated, sass.resourceid as resourceId, sact.Name AS Atividade, sp.Name AS Processo, null AS Urgencia, null as OrigemProcesso, null AS NomeBanco, dp.c_num_pedido AS NumeroWFBanco, null as NumeroWFPL, dp.c_tipo_distrate as TipoProcesso, null as NomeCliente, dp.c_estado_distrate AS EstadoContratacao, sact.Id AS ActivityId, from_unixtime(sact.LimitTime/1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as limittime, null as DataInicio, null as DataFim, null AS Cliente, null AS DataAgendamento, null as SLADuracao, null, null, p.c_servico as Servico, null as DateModified
FROM shkprocesses sp
JOIN app_fd_processos_distrates p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_proce_dist dp ON p.c_detalhe_processo = dp.id
LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
LEFT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
WHERE sass.resourceid LIKE '%#currentUser.username#%'
ORDER BY Urgencia DESC, DataFim)
UNION
(SELECT sp.Id as id, FROM_UNIXTIME(floor(sact.activated/1000)) as dateCreated, sass.resourceid as resourceId, sact.Name AS Atividade, sp.Name AS Processo, null AS Urgencia, null as OrigemProcesso, dp.c_nome_banco AS NomeBanco, dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NumeroWFBanco, dp.c_n_wf_pl as NumeroWFPL, null as TipoProcesso, null as NomeCliente, dp.c_estado_contratacao AS EstadoContratacao, sact.Id AS ActivityId, from_unixtime(sact.LimitTime/1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as limittime, null as DataInicio, null as DataFim, null AS Cliente, null AS DataAgendamento, null as SLADuracao, null, null, p.c_servico as Servico, null as DateModified
FROM shkprocesses sp
JOIN app_fd_processos_hip p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_proce_hip dp ON p.c_detalhe_processo = dp.id
LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
LEFT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
WHERE sass.resourceid LIKE '%#currentUser.username#%'
ORDER BY Urgencia DESC, DataFim)
